test_files.name: Discovering Deals in a Specific Home Category
test_files.title: Discovering Deals in a Specific Home Category

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com'.
Verify that verify the page title is 'Target : Expect More. Pay Less.'.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Deals' link in the main navigation (https://www.target.com/c/weekly-deals/-/N-4xw74?prehydrateClick=true).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/c/weekly-deals/-/N-4xw74?prehydrateClick=true'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's a 'Deals' or 'Weekly Deals' page.

phases.objective: Navigate to On the 'Weekly Deals' page, locate and click on a banner or link for 'Kitchen & Dining Deals' (https://www.target.com/c/kitchen-dining/all-deals/-/N-hz89jZakkos).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/c/kitchen-dining/all-deals/-/N-hz89jZakkos'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Kitchen & Dining Deals' section.

phases.objective: Navigate to Browse through the list of kitchen and dining products on sale.
Click on a specific product listing (e.g., product with ID 445416468, leading to https://www.target.com/pl/445416468) to view its details and discount information.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/pl/445416468'.
Verify that the product detail page displays a discounted price or deal indicator for the item.

test_files.name: Mobile User Browsing for Seasonal Inspiration
test_files.title: Mobile User Browsing for Seasonal Inspiration

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com'.
Verify that verify the page title is 'Target : Expect More. Pay Less.'.

phases.objective: Scroll down the homepage to quickly scan for prominent seasonal promotions or banners.
Click on the 'Halloween' promotional link or banner (https://www.target.com/c/halloween/-/N-5xt2o).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/c/halloween/-/N-5xt2o'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Halloween' hub page.

phases.objective: Scroll through the 'Halloween' hub page, scanning for different categories like costumes, decor, or candy, and general themes.

test_files.name: Quick Purchase of a Specific Brand Item
test_files.title: Quick Purchase of a Specific Brand Item

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com'.
Verify that verify the page title is 'Target : Expect More. Pay Less.'.

phases.objective: Type 'Stanley' into the search bar and press Enter.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the URL contains 'searchTerm=Stanley'.
Verify that search results for 'Stanley' are displayed on the page.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Stanley' brand link from search results, leading to https://www.target.com/b/stanley/-/N-5vhrz.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/b/stanley/-/N-5vhrz'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Stanley' brand page.

phases.objective: Navigate to On the Stanley brand page, click on a specific product listing (e.g., 'Stanley Quencher FlowState Tumbler') to view its detail page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is a product detail page (e.g., 'https://www.target.com/p/...' or similar structure).
Verify that product-specific details (name, price, description) are displayed.

phases.objective: Click the 'Add to Cart' button on the product detail page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify a confirmation message or visual indicator (e.g., mini-cart update) shows the item has been added to cart.

phases.objective: Click the 'View Cart' or 'Go to Cart' button to proceed to https://www.target.com/cart?prehydrateclick=true.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/cart?prehydrateclick=true'.
Verify that verify the previously added item is present in the shopping cart.

test_files.name: Detailed Research of a Product Category with Filters
test_files.title: Detailed Research of a Product Category with Filters

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com'.
Verify that verify the page title is 'Target : Expect More. Pay Less.'.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Categories' link in the main navigation (https://www.target.com/c/shop-all-categories/-/N-5xsxf?prehydrateClick=true).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/c/shop-all-categories/-/N-5xsxf?prehydrateClick=true'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'All Categories' page.

phases.objective: Navigate to From the categories page, click on the 'Women' category link (https://www.target.com/c/women/-/N-5xtd3).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/c/women/-/N-5xtd3'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Women's' category page.

phases.objective: Navigate to On the Women's page, click on the 'Jeans' subcategory link (https://www.target.com/c/jeans-women-s-clothing/-/N-5xtc8Z1vs54Zo267dZ54zprZe6p1m).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL contains '/c/jeans-women-s-clothing/'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Women's Jeans' page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate the 'Price' filter section on the Women's Jeans page and select the range '$20-$100' (this updates the URL to include '?maxprice=100&minprice=20&type=products').

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL contains 'maxprice=100&minprice=20'.
Verify that displayed products fall within the $20-$100 price range.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate the 'Sort By' dropdown menu and select 'Newest'.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the 'Sort By' dropdown selection visually updates to 'Newest'.

phases.objective: Scroll down the page to browse the filtered and sorted products.

test_files.name: Returning Visitor Checking Loyalty Program Benefits
test_files.title: Returning Visitor Checking Loyalty Program Benefits

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com'.
Verify that verify the page title is 'Target : Expect More. Pay Less.'.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Target Circle™' link in the top header navigation (https://www.target.com/circle).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/circle'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Target Circle' landing page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Read the overview and benefits described on the Target Circle landing page.

assertions.description: Verify that key Target Circle benefits (e.g., 'Earn 1% on every Target run') are visible on the page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click on the 'Target Circle™ Card' link (https://www.target.com/circlecard) to learn about additional card-specific benefits.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL is 'https://www.target.com/circlecard'.
Verify that verify the page heading or title confirms it's the 'Target Circle Card' details page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Review the details of the Target Circle Card program.

assertions.description: Verify that specific Target Circle Card benefits (e.g., '5% off every day') are prominently displayed.
